title.rendered: We’re hiring recruiters: 6 reasons you should apply!

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section admin_label=”section”][et_pb_row admin_label=”row”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

We’re just returning from our annual incentive trip to sunny Puerto Rico. A great time was had by all fishing, eating, enjoying the zip-lines and so much more. Which reminds us, we’re hiring! ClinLab Staffing is looking for more motivated and competitive professionals who are interested in joining a growing team of industry experts contributing to the success of our biotech, pharmaceutical, and medical device clients.

Why should you work here?

  1. Well, there’s the yearly trip for one thing
  2. We’ve got competitive compensation packages
  3. Full benefits including health, dental and company-sponsored 401k.
  4. Team training and development programs
  5. Amazing people that make up our growing team
  6. A history of company growth that is getting to be impressive!
We pride ourselves on our team atmosphere and the strong career path that we pave for our employees.  We have a young team that works hard and enjoys the benefits. Why not join us?
Apply today!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_gallery admin_label=”Gallery” gallery_ids=”1719,1721,1722,1720,1724,1725″ fullwidth=”off” show_title_and_caption=”off” show_pagination=”off” background_layout=”light” auto=”on” auto_speed=”5000″ hover_overlay_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.9)” caption_all_caps=”off” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” posts_number=”6″] [/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

meta._et_pb_old_content:
We're just returning from our annual President's Club staff trip to sunny Puerto Rico. A great time was had by all fishing, eating enjoying the ziplines and so much more. Which reminds us, we're hiring! ClinLab Staffing is looking for more motivated and competitive professionals who are interested in joining a growing team of professionals contributing to the success of our biotech, pharmaceutical, and medical device clients.

Why should you work here?

  • Well, there's the yearly trip for one thing
  • We've got competitive pay packages
  • Health and dental
  • Team training and development programs
  • Amazing people
  • A history of company growth that is getting to me impressive!
 
We pride ourselves on our team atmosphere and the strong career path that we pave for our employees.  We have a young team that works hard and enjoys the benefits.
 
Apply today!
